author: Mike Butcher
title: UK’s National Health Service launches £500,000 COVID19 tech competition - TechCrunch
description: The innovation arm of the UK’s National Health Service, NHSx has launched a £500,000 funding competition for innovators and startups who can find digital ways to support people in need during the Coronavirus outbreak. The fund will concentrate on tech initiat…
